options.content:
- Use Cases: This dashboard can be used to track bugs with metrics such as [Bug Age](https://devlake.apache.org/docs/Metrics/BugAge).
- Data Source Required: GitHub ([transformation](https://devlake.apache.org/docs/UserManuals/ConfigUI/GitHub#step-3---adding-transformation-rules-optional) required) or Jira ([transformation](https://devlake.apache.org/docs/UserManuals/ConfigUI/Jira#step-3---adding-transformation-rules-optional) required). Transformation is the configuration for you to tell DevLake what is a bug.

targets.rawSql:
select
  count(*)
from
  lake.issues as i
  join lake.board_issues bi on i.id = bi.issue_id
  join boards b on bi.board_id = b.id
where
  i.type in ($issue_type)
  and date(i.created_date) BETWEEN curdate() - INTERVAL WEEKDAY(curdate())+7 DAY AND curdate() - INTERVAL WEEKDAY(curdate())+1 DAY
  and b.id in ($board_id)

select
  priority,
  count(*) as 'Issue Number'
from
  lake.issues as i
  join lake.board_issues bi on i.id = bi.issue_id
  join boards b on bi.board_id = b.id
where
  i.type in ($issue_type)
  and date(i.created_date) BETWEEN curdate() - INTERVAL WEEKDAY(curdate())+7 DAY AND curdate() - INTERVAL WEEKDAY(curdate())+1 DAY
  and b.id in ($board_id)
group by 1

panels.title: Previous Week New Bug Count by Priority

targets.rawSql:
select
  i.issue_key as 'Issue Number',
  i.title as 'Title',
  i.url as 'Url'
from
  lake.issues as i
	join lake.board_issues bi on i.id = bi.issue_id
	join lake.boards b on bi.board_id = b.id
where
  i.type in ($issue_type)
  and date(i.created_date) BETWEEN curdate() - INTERVAL WEEKDAY(curdate())+7 DAY AND curdate() - INTERVAL WEEKDAY(curdate())+1 DAY
  and b.id in ($board_id)

select
  count(*)
from
  lake.issues as i
  join board_issues bi on i.id = bi.issue_id
	join boards b on bi.board_id = b.id
where
  i.type in ($issue_type)
  and status = 'DONE'
  and date(i.resolution_date) BETWEEN curdate() - INTERVAL WEEKDAY(curdate())+7 DAY AND curdate() - INTERVAL WEEKDAY(curdate())+1 DAY
  and b.id in ($board_id)

select
  avg(lead_time_minutes / 1440)
from
  lake.issues as i
	join board_issues bi on i.id = bi.issue_id
	join boards b on bi.board_id = b.id
where
  i.type in ($issue_type)
  and status = 'DONE'
  and date(i.resolution_date) BETWEEN curdate() - INTERVAL WEEKDAY(curdate())+7 DAY AND curdate() - INTERVAL WEEKDAY(curdate())+1 DAY
  and b.id in ($board_id)

panels.title: Average Lead Time of Last Week's Resolved Bugs in Days

targets.rawSql:
select
  i.issue_key as 'Issue Number',
  i.title as 'Title',
  lead_time_minutes/1440 as 'Lead Time in Days',
  i.url as 'Url'
from
  lake.issues as i
	join board_issues bi on i.id = bi.issue_id
	join boards b on bi.board_id = b.id
where
  i.type in ($issue_type)
  and status = 'DONE'
  and date(i.resolution_date) BETWEEN curdate() - INTERVAL WEEKDAY(curdate())+7 DAY AND curdate() - INTERVAL WEEKDAY(curdate())+1 DAY
  and b.id in ($board_id)

select
  concat('#',i.issue_key, ' ', i.title) as issue_key,
  lead_time_minutes/1440 as lead_time
from
  lake.issues as i
	join board_issues bi on i.id = bi.issue_id
	join boards b on bi.board_id = b.id
where
  i.type in ($issue_type)
  and status = 'DONE'
  and date(i.resolution_date) BETWEEN curdate() - INTERVAL WEEKDAY(curdate())+7 DAY AND curdate() - INTERVAL WEEKDAY(curdate())+1 DAY
  and b.id in ($board_id)
order by lead_time desc

panels.title: Lead Time Distribution [Last Week's Resolved Bugs in Days]

targets.rawSql:
select
  count(*)
from 
  lake.issues i
	join board_issues bi on i.id = bi.issue_id
	join boards b on bi.board_id = b.id
where
  i.type in ($issue_type)
  and i.status != 'DONE'
  and b.id in ($board_id)

select 
  avg((TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, i.created_date,NOW()))/1440)
from 
  lake.issues i
	join board_issues bi on i.id = bi.issue_id
	join boards b on bi.board_id = b.id
where
  i.type in ($issue_type)
  and i.status != 'DONE'
  and b.id in ($board_id)

panels.title: Average Age of Outstanding Bugs in Days

targets.rawSql:
select 
  i.issue_key as 'Issue Number',
  i.title as 'Title',
  (TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, i.created_date,NOW()))/1440 as 'Queue Time in Days',
  i.url as 'Url',
  priority
from 
  lake.issues i
	join board_issues bi on i.id = bi.issue_id
	join boards b on bi.board_id = b.id
where
  i.type in ($issue_type)
  and i.status != 'DONE'
  and b.id in ($board_id)
  and priority in ($priority)
order by 'Queue Time' desc

panels.title: Outstanding Bugs Sort by Queue Time [All History]

targets.rawSql:
select 
  concat('#', i.issue_key) as issue_key,
  (TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, i.created_date,NOW()))/1440 as 'Queue Time in Days'
from 
  lake.issues i
	join board_issues bi on i.id = bi.issue_id
	join boards b on bi.board_id = b.id
where
  i.type in ($issue_type)
  and i.status != 'DONE'
  and b.id in ($board_id)
order by 2 desc

panels.title: Distribution of Bug Queue Time in Days [Outstanding Bugs]

targets.rawSql:
select 
  i.issue_key as 'Issue Number',
  i.title as 'Title',
  (TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, i.created_date,NOW()))/1440 as 'Queue Time in Days',
  i.url as 'Url'
from 
  lake.issues i
	join board_issues bi on i.id = bi.issue_id
	join boards b on bi.board_id = b.id
where
  i.type in ($issue_type)
  and i.status != 'DONE'
  and i.assignee_name = ''
  and b.id in ($board_id)
order by 'Queue Time' desc

panels.title: Bugs to be Triaged Sort by Queue Time [All History]

targets.rawSql:
with bugs as (  
  select 
    DATE_ADD(date(i.created_date), INTERVAL -WEEKDAY(date(i.created_date)) DAY) as time,
    count(*) as bug_count
  from
    lake.issues as i
	  join lake.board_issues bi on i.id = bi.issue_id
	  join lake.boards b on bi.board_id = b.id
  where 
    i.type in ($issue_type)
    and $__timeFilter(i.created_date)
    and b.id in ($board_id)
  group by time
  order by time desc
),

calendar_date as(
	SELECT CAST((SYSDATE()-INTERVAL (H+T+U) DAY) AS date) d
	FROM ( SELECT 0 H
			UNION ALL SELECT 100 UNION ALL SELECT 200 UNION ALL SELECT 300
		) H CROSS JOIN ( SELECT 0 T
			UNION ALL SELECT  10 UNION ALL SELECT  20 UNION ALL SELECT  30
			UNION ALL SELECT  40 UNION ALL SELECT  50 UNION ALL SELECT  60
			UNION ALL SELECT  70 UNION ALL SELECT  80 UNION ALL SELECT  90
		) T CROSS JOIN ( SELECT 0 U
			UNION ALL SELECT   1 UNION ALL SELECT   2 UNION ALL SELECT   3
			UNION ALL SELECT   4 UNION ALL SELECT   5 UNION ALL SELECT   6
			UNION ALL SELECT   7 UNION ALL SELECT   8 UNION ALL SELECT   9
		) U
	WHERE
		(SYSDATE()-INTERVAL (H+T+U) DAY) >= (SYSDATE()-INTERVAL 6 MONTH)
),

calendar_weeks as(
  select 
  	distinct date(DATE_ADD(date(d), INTERVAL -WEEKDAY(date(d)) DAY)) as start_of_week
  FROM calendar_date
  ORDER BY 1 asc
)


select 
  concat(date_format(cw.start_of_week,'%m/%d'), ' - ', date_format(DATE_ADD(cw.start_of_week, INTERVAL +6 DAY),'%m/%d')) as week,
  case when bug_count is not null then bug_count else 0 end as 'Weekly New Bugs'
from calendar_weeks cw left join bugs b on cw.start_of_week = b.time
order by cw.start_of_week asc

with bugs as (
  select 
    DATE_ADD(date(i.resolution_date), INTERVAL -WEEKDAY(date(i.resolution_date)) DAY) as time,
    count(*) as bug_count
  from
    lake.issues as i
	  join lake.board_issues bi on i.id = bi.issue_id
	  join lake.boards b on bi.board_id = b.id
  where 
    i.type in ($issue_type)
    and status = 'DONE'
    and $__timeFilter(i.resolution_date)
    and b.id in ($board_id)
  group by time
  order by time desc
),

calendar_date as(
	SELECT CAST((SYSDATE()-INTERVAL (H+T+U) DAY) AS date) d
	FROM ( SELECT 0 H
			UNION ALL SELECT 100 UNION ALL SELECT 200 UNION ALL SELECT 300
		) H CROSS JOIN ( SELECT 0 T
			UNION ALL SELECT  10 UNION ALL SELECT  20 UNION ALL SELECT  30
			UNION ALL SELECT  40 UNION ALL SELECT  50 UNION ALL SELECT  60
			UNION ALL SELECT  70 UNION ALL SELECT  80 UNION ALL SELECT  90
		) T CROSS JOIN ( SELECT 0 U
			UNION ALL SELECT   1 UNION ALL SELECT   2 UNION ALL SELECT   3
			UNION ALL SELECT   4 UNION ALL SELECT   5 UNION ALL SELECT   6
			UNION ALL SELECT   7 UNION ALL SELECT   8 UNION ALL SELECT   9
		) U
	WHERE
		(SYSDATE()-INTERVAL (H+T+U) DAY) >= (SYSDATE()-INTERVAL 6 MONTH)
),

calendar_weeks as(
  select 
  	distinct date(DATE_ADD(date(d), INTERVAL -WEEKDAY(date(d)) DAY)) as start_of_week
  FROM calendar_date
  ORDER BY 1 asc
)

select 
  concat(date_format(cw.start_of_week,'%m/%d'), ' - ', date_format(DATE_ADD(cw.start_of_week, INTERVAL +6 DAY),'%m/%d')) as week,
  case when bug_count is not null then bug_count else 0 end as 'Weekly Closed Bugs'
from calendar_weeks cw left join bugs b on cw.start_of_week = b.time
order by cw.start_of_week asc

with calendar_date as(
	SELECT CAST((SYSDATE()-INTERVAL (H+T+U) DAY) AS date) d
	FROM ( SELECT 0 H
			UNION ALL SELECT 100 UNION ALL SELECT 200 UNION ALL SELECT 300
		) H CROSS JOIN ( SELECT 0 T
			UNION ALL SELECT  10 UNION ALL SELECT  20 UNION ALL SELECT  30
			UNION ALL SELECT  40 UNION ALL SELECT  50 UNION ALL SELECT  60
			UNION ALL SELECT  70 UNION ALL SELECT  80 UNION ALL SELECT  90
		) T CROSS JOIN ( SELECT 0 U
			UNION ALL SELECT   1 UNION ALL SELECT   2 UNION ALL SELECT   3
			UNION ALL SELECT   4 UNION ALL SELECT   5 UNION ALL SELECT   6
			UNION ALL SELECT   7 UNION ALL SELECT   8 UNION ALL SELECT   9
		) U
	WHERE
		(SYSDATE()-INTERVAL (H+T+U) DAY) >= (SYSDATE()-INTERVAL 6 MONTH)
),

calendar_weeks as(
  select 
  	distinct date(DATE_ADD(date(d), INTERVAL -WEEKDAY(date(d)) DAY)) as start_of_week
  FROM calendar_date
  ORDER BY 1 asc
),

created_bugs as (  
  select 
    DATE_ADD(date(i.created_date), INTERVAL -WEEKDAY(date(i.created_date)) DAY) as time,
    count(*) as bug_count
  from
    lake.issues as i
	  join lake.board_issues bi on i.id = bi.issue_id
	  join lake.boards b on bi.board_id = b.id
  where 
    i.type in ($issue_type)
    and $__timeFilter(i.created_date)
    and b.id in ($board_id)
  group by time
  order by time desc
),

resolved_bugs as (
  select 
    DATE_ADD(date(i.resolution_date), INTERVAL -WEEKDAY(date(i.resolution_date)) DAY) as time,
    count(*) as bug_count
  from
    lake.issues as i
	  join lake.board_issues bi on i.id = bi.issue_id
	  join lake.boards b on bi.board_id = b.id
  where 
    i.type in ($issue_type)
    and status = 'DONE'
    and $__timeFilter(i.resolution_date)
    and b.id in ($board_id)
  group by time
  order by time desc
),

weekly_new_bug as(
  select
    cw.start_of_week as week,
    case when bug_count is not null then bug_count else 0 end as weekly_new_bug
  from calendar_weeks cw left join created_bugs cb on cw.start_of_week = cb.time
),

weekly_closed_bug as(
  select
    cw.start_of_week as week,
    case when bug_count is not null then bug_count else 0 end as weekly_closed_bug
  from calendar_weeks cw left join resolved_bugs cb on cw.start_of_week = cb.time
),

weekly_updates as(
  SELECT t1.week, weekly_new_bug, weekly_closed_bug FROM weekly_new_bug t1
  LEFT JOIN weekly_closed_bug t2 ON t1.week = t2.week
  UNION
  SELECT t1.week, weekly_new_bug, weekly_closed_bug FROM weekly_new_bug t1
  RIGHT JOIN weekly_closed_bug t2 ON t1.week = t2.week
),


original_open_bugs as (
  SELECT 
    count(distinct i.id) as original_open_bug_count
  FROM
    lake.issues as i
	  join lake.board_issues bi on i.id = bi.issue_id
	  join lake.boards b on bi.board_id = b.id
  where 
    i.type in ($issue_type)
    and i.created_date < $__timeFrom()
    and (i.status != 'DONE' or $__timeFilter(i.resolution_date))
    and b.id in ($board_id)
),

weekly_updated_without_null as(
  SELECT 
    week, 
    COALESCE(weekly_new_bug,0) as weekly_new_bug, 
    COALESCE(weekly_closed_bug,0) as weekly_closed_bug,
    original_open_bug_count
  from weekly_updates, original_open_bugs
  where week is not null
),

weekly_delta as(
  SELECT 
    *,
    (weekly_new_bug - weekly_closed_bug) as weekly_delta
  from weekly_updated_without_null
  order by week asc
),

final_data as(
  SELECT 
    *,
    concat(date_format(week,'%m/%d'), ' - ', date_format(DATE_ADD(week, INTERVAL +6 DAY),'%m/%d')) as _week,
    sum(weekly_delta) over(order by week asc) as weekly_accumulated
  from weekly_delta
)

SELECT 
  _week,
  (original_open_bug_count + weekly_accumulated) as "Total No. of Outstanding Bugs By the End of Week" from final_data

panels.title: Total Outstanding Bug Count by Week [Selected Time Range]

options.content: This dashboard is created based on this [data schema](https://devlake.apache.org/docs/DataModels/DevLakeDomainLayerSchema). Want to add more metrics? Please follow the [guide](https://devlake.apache.org/docs/UserManuals/Dashboards/GrafanaUserGuide).

list.definition: select concat(name, '-', id) as text from boards
list.label: Board
list.name: board_id
list.query: select concat(name, '-', id) as text from boards
